name: Gale Guard
description: If one truly listens, they can always rely upon the wind to make its will known.

abilities.name: Cyclonic Shield
abilities.description: Envelops the caster in an all damage barrier that absorbs a percentage of incoming damage up to a certain amount. While the barrier is active, the caster has slow resistance.
notes: Interrupts the user's channeling abilities upon cast
When crafted with the Dormant Curio, the barrier health is increased by 30%

additionalInfo: Acquired by crafting with Madstone. See the Madstone article for crafting mechanics.
